First Familiarize Yourself with Your Machines.
To avoid cluster sort Your Clothes according to variety ex : wool, cotton, silk etc.,

Once you mixed the detergent to water put clothes and select appropriate button.
After wash take the cloth and hang separately on the hanger for avoiding soapy smell.
Take all the clothes fold it as you wish and keep in the cupboard.
Don't forget to change the anti pest pouch once a month or as directed.

Look for delicate items that can't go into the dryer and hang them.
When they are finished, fold them and put them away.
